data.title: Jason Terry Player Profile, Milwaukee Bucks
data.meta_description: Get the latest news, stats and more about Jason Terry on RealGM.com
data.text: Jun 30, 1999 - The Atlanta Hawks selected Jason Terry in Round 1 with Pick 10 in the 1999 NBA Draft. Jul 11, 1999 - Jason Terry signed a multi-year contract with the Atlanta Hawks. Oct 26, 2001 - The Atlanta Hawks exercised their Team Option to extend the contract of Jason Terry. Jun 26, 2003 - The Atlanta Hawks tendered a Qualifying Offer to make Jason Terry a Restricted FA. Jul 1, 2003 - Jason Terry, previously with the Atlanta Hawks, became a free agent. Sep 11, 2003 - Jason Terry signed a multi-year offer sheet with the Utah Jazz. Since he is a restricted free agent, the Atlanta Hawks can match. Sep 25, 2003 - The Atlanta Hawks matched the offer sheet that Jason Terry signed with the Utah Jazz. Oct 1, 2003 - Jason Terry signed a multi-year contract with the Atlanta Hawks. Aug 4, 2004 - Jason Terry was acquired by the Dallas Mavericks, along with Alan Henderson, a conditional 2007 1st round pick (PHL own), cash and a TPE, from the Atlanta Hawks in exchange for Tony Delk and Antoine Walker. Jul 1, 2006 - Jason Terry, previously with the Dallas Mavericks, became a free agent. Jul 24, 2006 - Jason Terry signed a multi-year contract with the Dallas Mavericks. Jul 1, 2012 - Jason Terry, previously with the Dallas Mavericks, became a free agent. Jul 13, 2012 - The Dallas Mavericks renounced their free-agent exception rights to Jason Terry. Jul 17, 2012 - Jason Terry signed a multi-year contract with the Boston Celtics. Jul 12, 2013 - Jason Terry was acquired by the Brooklyn Nets, along with Kevin Garnett, Paul Pierce, D.J. White and a conditional 2017 2nd round pick (BOS own), from the Boston Celtics in exchange for Keith Bogans, MarShon Brooks, Kris Humphries, Kris Joseph, Gerald Wallace, a 2014 1st round pick (BRK own), a 2016 1st round pick (BRK own), a Swap 2017 1st round picks and a 2018 1st round pick (BRK own). Feb 19, 2014 - Jason Terry was acquired by the Sacramento Kings, along with Reggie Evans and a TPE, from the Brooklyn Nets in exchange for Marcus Thornton and a TPE. Sep 17, 2014 - Jason Terry was acquired by the Houston Rockets, along with a conditional 2015 2nd round pick (SAC own) and a conditional 2016 2nd round pick (NYK own), from the Sacramento Kings in exchange for Alonzo Gee and Scotty Hopson. Jul 1, 2015 - Jason Terry, previously with the Houston Rockets, became a free agent. Jul 20, 2015 - The Houston Rockets renounced their free-agent exception rights to Jason Terry. Aug 24, 2015 - Jason Terry signed a contract with the Houston Rockets. Jul 1, 2016 - Jason Terry, previously with the Houston Rockets, became a free agent. Jul 9, 2016 - The Houston Rockets renounced their free-agent exception rights to Jason Terry. Aug 22, 2016 - Jason Terry signed a contract with the Milwaukee Bucks. Jul 1, 2017 - Jason Terry, previously with the Milwaukee Bucks, became a free agent. Sep 18, 2017 - Jason Terry signed a contract with the Milwaukee Bucks. Jul 1, 2018 - Jason Terry, previously with the Milwaukee Bucks, became a free agent. Feb 7, 2019 - The Milwaukee Bucks renounced their free-agent exception rights to Jason Terry.
